website_summaries.verdict: Nature Zone’s moist and soft musk melon flavored gel cubes are both palatable for tortoises, as well as a nutritionally balanced formula containing the essential vitamins, minerals, fiber, and easily digested proteins they need to thrive.
pros: Water, soy protein, whole egg powder, whey protein, and carrageenan (seaweed) are the first 5 ingredients
Irresistible musk melon flavor and scent
Fortified with core vitamins and minerals
cons: The 1 gallon sized container may seem pricy at first, but if your tortoise is a fan, this is a fantastic bulk purchase

customer_reviews.title: Dead turtle
customer_reviews.text: Had a healthy wood turtle, fed her this and she was dead two days later. I don’t know if this killed her but I do know she was at the vet just a month prior and was less than 2yrs old and healthy before I gave her this.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne & Adam

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise Approved
customer_reviews.text: My Russian tortoise seems to love his new snacks! Glad I purchased them to change it up a bit for him!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rauer

customer_reviews.title: Second ingredient is sucrose
customer_reviews.text: I checked the ingredient list in description, and it's not listed. I wasn't looking for a product to be a majority of Littlefoots diet, just something fun and different. So, my 3 year old Redfoot tortoise loves it. I only give it as a treat, because the 2nd ingredient is sucrose. If he didn't love it I would give it to the back yard animals, but his diet is healthy enough that the vet is ok with him having this 3x a week. Be sure to refrigerate!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Malnourished Sulcata!
customer_reviews.text: I recently acquired a very malnourished vitamin deficient sulcata that is about 8 months old hes was so bad his center spots never finished developing and where sunk in he very dehydrated and weak I got him home soaked him for over a hr put him in a fresh enclosure and slowly started to offer him fresh greens being the folks I got him from where feeding him iceberg when he started eating the romaine I slowly started integrating in the tortoise bites and after about a week his spots started raising and he was full of life again thank you tortoise bites we gave the little sulcata a second chance at life I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if they stop making these will my tortoise hate ME for it?
customer_reviews.text: After feeding these to my Russian Tortoise he won't shut up about them. I kind of wish I never got them for him because now if I don't buy them again he won't love me anymore. My Sulcata seems to love them too but she loves anything she can fit in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it tastes like but I have a picky guy and he won’t touch the stuff. It’s all on him though because he turns his nose up at almost everything except his damn Romaine hearts. Strawberries, apples, mixed greens, etc. he just won’t touch the stuff. I keep trying and I will because I’m hoping he’ll change his mind eventually.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's desert tortoise. He's not really moving much, or even really eating. I think it's because he needs to adjust to his new home, or maybe doing the hibernating thing. Anyways, I haven't been able to tell if he likes it or not. The product was unopened and fresh. It's stored well in the fridge. It smells like fruit, which is nice. They are in little bite sized cubes, so no prep needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Box turtle favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time feeding a very picky box turtle. She only likes a few foods. She gobbles up every bite of this as soon as I feed her. It’s great to find another healthy food option for her .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For TORTOISE, not Turtle...
customer_reviews.text: Please note these are for TORTOISE, not TURTLE. My stupidity in purchase for aquatic turtle, but I am sure a great product for the tortoise!!
customer_reviews.author: Tree Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: yuky
customer_reviews.text: Before my tortoise died. He would not eat this melted mess of squash.plus it smells bad. When it was delivered to me it didn't looked good because the heat melted it. Making it look like melted cheese. A waste of my money 💵 since my tortoise would not eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing this product!! Yubaba really likes it !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a SUPER picky tortoise, and I mean picky to the point she won't eat anything that she doesn't like (she rather starve and throws everything off her plate on the floor to show she's not happy) but fortunately she likes this food a lot, I just ordered her second batch!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keidy Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Food to eat
customer_reviews.text: This is what my kids tortoise ate for years. However by the time it got to us the tortoise got out of its outdoor enclosure, never happend before. I tried to send back but amazon did not need me to and just refunded the cost which was great. But this is definitely the best and favored our tortoise ate.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ph

customer_reviews.title: My Herman's tortoise hates it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to feed my baby tort when I'm busy/ no greens available at the house. Unfortunately, he hates it with all his heart. Also, it smells horrible and the ingredient list is just super bad. Second ingredient is sucrose, really? Give your tort a favor. Spend the money on fresh greens and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: My tortoise absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby tortoise is very picky and I was having a difficult time finding the right food for his needs. Then I came across this product and problem solved! He loves it and eats daily his allotted portion. Remember to refrigerate.
customer_reviews.author: Derima

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering these every month for my russian tortoise as a side treat. He loves them and its moist for hydration. One package came in damaged out of about 8 but was replaced in 1 day. Dont forget to refrigerate after opening it or it will dry out.
customer_reviews.author: maine

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise approved good supplement
customer_reviews.text: My redfoots/yellowfoot tortoises a box/wood Turtles ate this and even my picky eaters really enjoyed I have been purchasing products for my tortoises that have shelf life for some out of season items or for emergencies my tortoises and turtles are rescues amazon has just what I need and in the size I need fast shipping will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Ammobizzbutt

customer_reviews.title: Food....
customer_reviews.text: Turtles love it.. I do wish it cam in a smaller containers...
customer_reviews.author: Robin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and moist
customer_reviews.text: Turtle absolutely loves it! Nice and moist. Chopped in good size for an average sized turtle. Great amount for the money. 4 starts though because the reusable lid was cracked upon arrival, it didn't happen in shipping like there is NO WAY the lid on it was the right size, it cracked because it was too small and obviously had a machine stamp it on,your so had to put in Tupperware to keep from drying out
customer_reviews.author: Spacemonkeysmom

customer_reviews.title: My box turtlesw love this. I am worried sometimes about them getting ...
customer_reviews.text: My box turtlesw love this. I am worried sometimes about them getting a balanced diet since they do not seem to like to eat any insects or high-protein food, They seem to prefer fruits and vegetables, but they like this stuff and i mix it in with their other food.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Eytcheson

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My baby box turtle loves these. I feed him some every 2-3 days, along with Dubia roaches and he is happier than a McDonald's kid's meal. Oh, and it smells AMAZING, unlike the roaches😂
customer_reviews.author: Jacob.

customer_reviews.title: My boxie and ornate woodie like it
customer_reviews.text: I mix the Bites with their regular food and both the baby box turtle and the older ornate wood turtle readily eat the mixture. The fact that the Bites smell really fruity nice is an added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: My two sulcata tortoises will not touch this stuff. Both were a little slow to eat so thought this might help but even now when they are older and eating properly, neither one will touch this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Yummy tortious treats
customer_reviews.text: My tortious love this stuff. They wait for it and gobble it up - it doesn’t have smell to me - but my tortious see it and run after it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Oakley

customer_reviews.title: First time for these. Our box turtle appears to love them.
customer_reviews.text: We're using these as treats rather than an every-day food. Our box turtle, who is fussy eater, appears to love them.
customer_reviews.author: John Robin

customer_reviews.title: Box turtles weren't interested.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. I hoped my box turtles would eat on it while we were away, but they are picky. Mostly reviewing in case someone else is considering these for their boxxie
customer_reviews.author: Pets and love

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and provides vital nutrients.
customer_reviews.text: It smells great. I put it in my baby Hermanns enclosure and they started to nibble on it right away. This is definitely a treat so dont feed it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Treat only
customer_reviews.text: The nutritional content of these means they shouldn't be a staple food, but are great for an occasional treat. My cherryhead loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sulcata
customer_reviews.text: Tortoise refused to touch this and would actually pick around/ spit out if it got one. Guessing it must taste bad to a Sulcata.

customer_reviews.title: Our tortoise wouldn't touch it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just our tortoise being picky, but he wanted nothing to do with this food. I had no issues getting the item, so it's not fair for me to give only one star, but since the tortoise wouldn't touch it, the most I can give is 2 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this (and so does my tortoise!) My tortoise can be a little picky so I was nervous trying this, but he loves it, and it’s super nice that it’s already prepared. I’m definitely buying it again!

customer_reviews.text: Tough to review because my tortoises may be picky eaters. But, they won't eat them very often.

customer_reviews.text: Our Russian Tortoise loves this food it is nice and soft When it comes out so you do not have to add any water to.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great supplement for my picky turtles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great supplement for my picky turtles. They don't always eat them, but usually they have a few bites. Just be sure to refrigerate after opening. It does say it on the package, but it is in really small letters.

customer_reviews.title: Improved appetite
customer_reviews.text: My little Herman’s tortoises girls love this stuff. I have seen their appetite improved. I was worried when the dish hadn’t been touched. Now it’s 95% eaten. I sprinkle it over their mixed greens.

customer_reviews.title: Open container.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend to buy online. Container was open , tortoise food everywhere. Can't blame Amazon. Seems moist still ok I guess.

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my Sulcata will eat these, and sometimes not. When he does, he eats only a few, preferring greens. Hopefully, his diet has more balance with these bites.

customer_reviews.title: Not My Turtle's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several times and our Red Ear Slider just will not eat this so we just threw it away.

customer_reviews.title: May need a couple containers if you have more than one turtle
customer_reviews.text: My turtles are not the biggest fans but will eat it. Great to add with fresh vegetables and fruits.

customer_reviews.title: Turtle doesn't like

customer_reviews.title: Good product for our boxie

Now, he is eating normally! It smells good and I like how there is moisture in it unlike other tortoise food. It is easier to chew and is another way for him to get more water in his diet.

product_meta.title: Nature Zone Bites for Tortoises
product_meta.description: Size:9-OunceNature Zone TRB1 Bites for Tortoises are a soft, moist, and ready to eat food designed specifically for tortoises. Nature Zone TRB1 Bites for Tortoises are made in the USA with the highest quality human grade ingredients. The orange color and musk melon flavor and scent, attract tortoises, and keep them eating this healthy vitamin and mineral fortified diet. Nature Zone TRB1 Bites for Tortoises are cut into bite-sized, convenient, ready-to-eat 1/4 inch cubes. The unique tortoise formula features isolated whey & soy proteins, which are easily digested and contain amino acids that are critical for growth, soluble plant fiber, for intestinal health, carbohydrates for energy, calcium lactate to help prevent metabolic bone disease (MBD) and a natural, balanced, water to solid ratio that mimics the leafy vegetables which tortoises eat. Color or hue may vary
feature_bullets: Melon flavored tortoise total bites soft-moist food is specifically tailored to attract and stimulate the appetite of your reptile
These small bite soft gel foods are easy for the reptile to eat
Completely balanced formula is packed with amino acids, protein and minerals
It is has the aroma and flavor of Musk Melon which tortoises find irresistible

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
